channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: Caught On Camera: Off-duty Mumbai Cop Saves Man From Being Run Over By Train
item.description: Caught On Camera: Off-duty Mumbai Cop Saves Man From Being Run Over By Train#MumbaiCop #ViralVideo #News #TimesNow #TimesNowNews

item.title: AAP MLA Amanatullah Khan Arrested After ED Raids At Home
item.description: ED team arrests AAP MLA Amanatullah Khan.ED officials had arrived at his residence to conduct a raid, earlier today.#ED #AmanatullahKhan #News #TimesNow #TimesNowNews

item.description: Click https://shorturl.at/OZ06T || A three-year-old girl was killed and two other women were injured in the latest attack by wolves in Uttar Pradesh's Bahraich district Click https://shorturl.at/OZ06T || A three-year-old girl was killed and two other women were injured in the latest attack by wolves in Uttar Pradesh's Bahraich district
